channel.title: Centos on 乱世浮生

item.title: Centos编译安装Redis
item.description: 版本 Centos7 Redis3.2.8 编译安装 1 2 3 4 5 wget http://download.redis.io/releases/redis-3.2.8.tar.gz tar -zxvf redis-3.2.8.tar.gz cd redis-3.2.8 sudo make test sudo make install 启动 1 redis-server 问题 /bin/sh: cc: command not found 原因：Centos安装时选择的类型是Infrastructure，
